reporter_caption.center: CROWN AMERICAN PROPERTIES v. WESTGATE, 568 Pa. 632 (2002)

caption.center: CROWN AMERICAN PROPERTIES, L.P., Respondent v. BETH WESTGATE, INC.,

court.center: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Middle District.

opinion.posture: No. 628 MAL 2001, Petition for Allowance of Appeal from the Superior Court.
opinion.opinion_text: AND NOW, this 28th day of January, 2002, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby DENIED.
